section-1.title: Career at Mad Devs
section-1.description: Without empty words, here at Mad Devs we partner with projects where our teams thrive. Innovating solutions, carrying ownership, delivering sustainable value and celebrating successes — make a happy workplace, where things get done.

section-2.title: Global projects in 20+ countries
section-2.description: We build solutions for 35M+ users worldwide

section-3.title: Sustainable engineering culture
section-3.description: At Mad Devs, we build an environment where teams can move sustainably and quickly by implementing modern technologies and best practices.
section-3.list: Code reviews and testing, Automated CI/CD, Healthy oncall, Internal boilerplates and open-source, Regularly updated and reliable documentation.

section-4.title: Agile development
section-4.description: High talent density in our 20+ teams creates a culture where collaboratively innovative and autonomous people thrive.
section-4.list: Clearly explained development goals,  Engineers contribute to backlog and roadmap, Direct, cult-the bullshit, communication in problem-solving, Celebrating initiatives culture, Cross-functional collaboration.

section-5.title: Competitive and reliable compensation
section-5.description: Everybody at Mad Devs, from C-suite to junior developers, <span class='green'>gets paid competitive compensation in USD.</green>
section-5.list: Stable salary and pay day, Competitive compensation, Formal employment, Flexible payment terms, Salary, benefits and bonuses paid in USD
